content: 1/4 crochet pumpkin pattern version 1 nov 2008 supplies needed worsted yarn scraps polyfill wool batting or other filler size h crochet hook yarn needle gage is not important just keep consistent through out original purchasers only may sew and sell up to 50 items a year from this pattern please give credit to me by including the item name cuddlebub creations crochet food in your on line listing title and link to my website www cuddlebubcreations com the following text should accompany your listing item created with pattern from cuddlebub creations this and other patterns may be found at www cuddlebubcreations com pattern creator allows limited crocheting and selling from pattern designs this work is licensed under the creative commons attribution-no derivative works 3 0 united states license to view a copy of this license visit http //creativecommons org/licenses/by-nd/3 0/us/ or send a letter to creative commons 171 second street suite 300 san francisco california 94105 usa 2/4 pumpkin recipe the pumpkin is worked in the round make sure to mark the beginning of the round with a stitch marker with orange yarn beginning and making your pumpkin fat round 1 chain 2 11 double_crochet in 2nd chain from hook join w/ slip_stitch round 2 chain 3 counts as first double_crochet now and through out fpdc in the same stitch bpdc in the next stitch each row you will do a bpdc in the bpdc of the previous round to give the pumpkin it s indented stripes make two fpdc in the next stitch bpdc in the next stitch five times slip_stitch to join the round 18 double_crochet total round 3 chain 3 fpdc in the same stitch two fpdc in the next stitch bpdc in the next stitch two fpdc in the next two stitches and bpdc in the next stitch five times sl st in the beginning chain three to join the round 30 double_crochet total round 4 chain 3 fpdc in the same stitch fpdc in the next two stitches two fpdc in the next stitch bpdc in the next stitch two fpdc in the next stitch fpdc in the next two stitches two fpdc in the next stitch and bpdc in the next stitch five times sl st in the beginning chain three to join the round 42 double_crochet total round 5 chain 3 fpdc in the same stitch fpdc in the next four stitches two fpdc in the next stitch bpdc in the next stitch two fpdc in the next stitch fpdc in the next four stitches two fpdc in the next stitch and bpdc in the next stitch five times sl st in the beginning chain three to join the round 54 double_crochet total for the tiny pumpkin stop increasing here for the medium pumpkin increase one more round and for the big pumpkin increase two more rounds round 6 chain 3 fpdc in the same stitch fpdc in the next 6ix stitches two fpdc in the next stitch bpdc in the next
